languages.text: "Значит, их мы тоже найдем и убьем. Неумирающему неугодно, что они еще дышат. Это будет исправлено".
"Then we will find and kill them too. If they are still breathing, they are offending the Undying One. That will be remedied shortly."
languages.original_text: "Значит, их мы тоже найдем и убьем. Неумирающему неугодно, что они еще дышат. Это будет исправлено".

traits.locale_text: "Then we will find and kill them too. If they are still breathing, it offends The Undying One. That will be remedied shortly."
"Then we will find and kill them too. If they are still breathing, it offends The Undying One. That will be remedied shortly."
"Then we will find and kill them too. If they are still breathing, they are offending The Undying One. That will be remedied shortly."
"Then we will find and kill them too. If they are still breathing, they are offending The Undying One. That will be remedied shortly."
"Then we will find and kill them too. If they are still breathing, they are offending the Undying One. That will be remedied shortly."
"Then we will find and kill them too. If they are still breathing, they are offending the Undying One. That will be remedied shortly."

languages.text: "Dann werden wir sie finden und ebenfalls töten. Falls sie noch atmen, beleidigen sie den Todlosen. Das werden wir in Kürze ändern."
languages.original_text: "Then we will find and kill them too. If they are still breathing, they are offending the Undying One. That will be remedied shortly."

traits.locale_text: "Dann werden wir sie finden und ebenfalls töten. Falls sie noch atmen, beleidigen sie den Todlosen. Das werden wir in Kürze ändern."

languages.text: «Entonces los encontraremos y los mataremos también. Si siguen vivos, son una ofensa para el Inmortal. Lo solucionaremos pronto».
languages.original_text: "Then we will find and kill them too. If they are still breathing, they are offending the Undying One. That will be remedied shortly."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces los encontraremos y los mataremos también. Si siguen vivos, son una ofensa para el Inmortal. Lo solucionaremos pronto».

languages.text: 「それなら、奴らも見つけ出して殺す。もしまだ息をしているのなら、不死の者を怒らせることになる。すぐに対処しなければ」
languages.original_text: "Then we will find and kill them too. If they are still breathing, they are offending the Undying One. That will be remedied shortly."

traits.locale_text: 「それなら、奴らも見つけ出して殺す。もしまだ息をしているのなら、不死の者を怒らせることになる。すぐに対処しなければ」

languages.text: “既然这样，我们也会找到他们，杀光他们。只要他们还活着，他们就是在亵渎不死之神。这个错误很快就会得到补救。”
languages.original_text: "Then we will find and kill them too. If they are still breathing, they are offending the Undying One. That will be remedied shortly."

traits.locale_text: “既然这样，我们也会找到他们，杀光他们。只要他们还活着，他们就是在亵渎不死之神。这个错误很快就会得到补救。”

languages.text: « Alors, nous les trouverons et nous les tuerons également. Car leur simple existence est une offense à l'Immortel. Nous y remédierons sous peu. »
languages.original_text: "Then we will find and kill them too. If they are still breathing, they are offending the Undying One. That will be remedied shortly."

traits.locale_text: « Alors, nous les trouverons et nous les tuerons également. Car leur simple existence est une offense à l'Immortel. Nous y remédierons sous peu. »

languages.text: "O hâlde onları da bulup öldürürüz. Hâlâ nefes alıyorlarsa Ölmeyen'e karşı günah işliyorlar. Bunun hemen çaresine bakılacak."
languages.original_text: "Then we will find and kill them too. If they are still breathing, they are offending the Undying One. That will be remedied shortly."
